pros: Great management vision and overall company culture with a team composed of genuine and smart people to work with. Great culture that fosters innovation and personal development
cons: Can't see any cons at the moment

pros: The company is open to give the first job opportunity to immigrants. The got a very rich multiethnic environment.  It is in a very convenient Downtown location.
cons: None benefits plan, or employee’s incentives

review_title: Good environment for immigrant and jr employee
pros: multi cultural environment, well located, near metro station
cons: Low salary, management is not supportive, very noisy environment, poor benefits and compensation
